CustomField.description: This field is getting used in process builder "Actions from Account" to trigger the Starter bonus for Contractors. This field will get auto UNCHECK to avoid triggering more coop funds allocation. Another field "STARTER BONUS Co-op $ Generated ?" will get an auto check when Starter Bonus fund is allocated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will get auto UNCHECK to avoid triggering more coop funds allocation. Another field "Co-OP Starter Bonus Generated ?" will get an auto check when Starter Bonus fund is allocated.
CustomField.label: Generate Co-OP Starter Bonus
